Uses of Class
org.pepstock.charba.client.enums.InteractionAxis

  • Packages that use InteractionAxis 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration
    Contains all elements to use to configure a chart instance (know as chart options at instance level).
    org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults
    Contains all interfaces need to provide defaults value of the chart options.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.chart
    Contains the default values of chart options based on type of chart instance.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.globals
    Contains the default values of chart options for all chart types and used in the global options.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.enums
    Contains all enumeration of some chart options where the value can have only a specific set of values.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.options
    Contains all elements to use to configure charts at global level (know as chart global options).

    • Uses of InteractionAxis in org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration

      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration that return InteractionAxis 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InteractionAxis Hover.getAxis()
      Returns to 'x', 'y', or 'xy' to define which directions are used in calculating distances.
      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration with parameters of type InteractionAxis 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Hover.setAxis(InteractionAxis axis)
      Sets to 'x', 'y', or 'xy' to define which directions are used in calculating distances.
      Defaults to 'x' for index mode and 'xy' in dataset and nearest modes.

      InteractionAxis IsDefaultHover.getAxis()
